languages.text: "И... да. Мой груз содержит ксеноартефакты, обладание которыми суть смертный приговор для простолюдинов... Однако вы, шерин, не показались мне таков{mf|ым|ой}. И если бы я рассказала вам обо всем напрямую, вы бы стали, скажем, соучастни{mf|ком|цей}. Но так как заветные слова не прозвучали из моих уст — вы всего лишь согласились помочь страждущей мне отбить несколько контейнеров. Я искренне желала оградить вас от лишнего беспокойства, шерин. Клянусь Великим! И надеюсь, что это, хм, недоразумение не помешает нашему будущему сотрудничеству?"

traits.locale_text: "Послушайте, {name}. Я приношу свои искренние извинения. В моем ремесле чем меньше знают окружающие, тем меньше у них вопросов. Мне не следовало утаивать от вас, о чем идет речь в нашем договоре. Да, мой груз содержит ксеноартефакты, обладание которыми суть смертный приговор для простолюдинов... Однако вас, шерин, влады{mf|ку|чицу} миров и держател{mf|я|ьницу} священного Патента, не касаются подобные ограничения. Так может ли это, хм, недоразумение помешать нашему будущему сотрудничеству?"

languages.text: "And... yes, my shipment contains xeno-artefacts, possession of which is a death sentence for any commoner... But you, shereen, do not strike me as a commoner. If I had told you directly, you would have become, shall we say, complicit. But since those illicit words did not escape my lips, you would merely be agreeing to help an unfortunate soul — me — to recapture a few containers. My sincerest wish was to protect you from any unnecessary trouble, shereen. I swear by the Exalted One! And I do hope that this, ah, misunderstanding will not affect our future cooperation...?"
languages.original_text: "И... да. Мой груз содержит ксеноартефакты, обладание которыми суть смертный приговор для простолюдинов... Однако вы, шерин, не показались мне таков{mf|ым|ой}. И если бы я рассказала вам обо всем напрямую, вы бы стали, скажем, соучастни{mf|ком|цей}. Но так как заветные слова не прозвучали из моих уст — вы всего лишь согласились помочь страждущей мне отбить несколько контейнеров. Я искренне желала оградить вас от лишнего беспокойства, шерин. Клянусь Великим! И надеюсь, что это, хм, недоразумение не помешает нашему будущему сотрудничеству?"

traits.locale_text: "And... yes, my shipment contains xeno-artefacts, possession of which is a death sentence for any commoner... But you, shereen, do not strike me as a commoner. If I had told you directly, you would have become, shall we say, complicit. But since those illicit words did not escape my lips, you would merely be agreeing to help an unfortunate soul — me — to recapture a few containers. My sincerest wish was to protect you from any unnecessary trouble, shereen. I swear by the Exalted One! And I do hope that this, ah, misunderstanding will not affect our future cooperation...?"

"Listen, {name}. I'm genuinely sorry about this. In my trade, the less others know, the less questions they ask. I shouldn't have kept the truth about our agreement from you. Yes, my shipment contains xeno-artifacts, possession of which is a death sentence to any commoner... but you, shereen — what are these rules to you, one who is above the pitiful servants of the Imperium? How can this, hm, misunderstanding possibly affect our future partnership?"

"And... yes, my shipment contains xeno-artefacts, possession of which is a death sentence for any commoner... But you, shereen, do not strike me as a commoner. If I had told you directly, you would have become, shall we say, complicit. But since those illicit words did not escape my lips, you would merely be agreeing to help an unfortunate soul — me — to recapture a few containers. My sincerest wish was to protect you from any unnecessary trouble, shereen. I swear by the Exalted One! And I do hope that this, ah, misunderstanding will not affect our future cooperation...?"

"Listen, {name}. I'm genuinely sorry about this. In my trade, the less others know, the fewer questions they ask. I shouldn't have kept the truth about our agreement from you. Yes, my shipment contains xeno-artefacts, possession of which is a death sentence to any commoner... but you, shereen — what are these rules to you, one who is above the pitiful servants of the Imperium? We won't let this, ah, misunderstanding affect our future cooperation now, will we?"

"And... yes, my shipment contains xeno-artefacts, possession of which is a death sentence for any commoner... But you, shereen, do not strike me as a commoner. If I had told you directly, you would have become, shall we say, complicit. But since those illicit words did not escape my lips, you would merely be agreeing to help an unfortunate soul — me — to recapture a few containers. My sincerest wish was to protect you from any unnecessary trouble, shereen. I swear by the Exalted One! And I do hope that this, ah, misunderstanding will not affect our future cooperation...?"

"And... yes, my shipment contains xeno-artefacts, possession of which is a death sentence for any commoner... But you, shereen, do not strike me as a commoner. If I had told you directly, you would have become, shall we say, complicit. But since those illicit words did not escape my lips, you would merely be agreeing to help an unfortunate soul — me — to recapture a few containers. My sincerest wish was to protect you from any unnecessary trouble, shereen. I swear by the Exalted One! And I do hope that this, ah, misunderstanding will not affect our future cooperation...?"

languages.text: “还有……没错，我这批货里有异形造物。对平民而言，拥有这些东西意味着会被立刻处死……但是你，亲爱的，我觉得你看起来不像普通人。如果我把所有真相都告诉了你，你就会变成我的……这么说吧，我的同谋。但只要我没有说出那些不正当的言论，那你仅仅是答应帮我拿回几个集装箱而已。我真诚地希望你不会惹上任何不必要的麻烦，亲爱的。我对至高无上的神皇发誓！所以你看，咱们还是不要让这场，呃，误会，影响到我们未来的合作，好吗……？”
languages.original_text: "And... yes, my shipment contains xeno-artefacts, possession of which is a death sentence for any commoner... But you, shereen, do not strike me as a commoner. If I had told you directly, you would have become, shall we say, complicit. But since those illicit words did not escape my lips, you would merely be agreeing to help an unfortunate soul — me — to recapture a few containers. My sincerest wish was to protect you from any unnecessary trouble, shereen. I swear by the Exalted One! And I do hope that this, ah, misunderstanding will not affect our future cooperation...?"

traits.locale_text: “你看，{name}，这件事情我真的非常抱歉。在我这个行业里，别人知道的事情越少，他们问的问题就越少。我不该对你隐瞒我们之间协议的真相。没错，我这批货里有异形造物。对平民而言，拥有这些东西就意味着会被立刻处死……但是你，亲爱的，你是无数世界的{mf|主人|女主人}，拥有神圣的贸易许可证，这些规则对你而言并不适用。所以你看，咱们还是不要让这场，呃，误会，影响到我们未来的合作，好吗？”

languages.text: «Y sí, en mi cargamento hay xenoartefactos, lo que supondría la condena a muerte para cualquier persona de a pie... aunque usted, shereen, no me parece una persona de a pie. De habérselo dicho directamente, se habría convertido técnicamente en cómplice. Pero, ya que esas palabras ilícitas nunca abandonaron mis labios, tan solo estaba aceptando ayudar a una desdichada (yo) a recuperar unos contenedores. Deseaba de corazón evitarle todo problema, shereen, ¡lo juro por el Exaltado! De modo que espero que este, digamos, malentendido no condicione nuestros tratos futuros...».
languages.original_text: "And... yes, my shipment contains xeno-artefacts, possession of which is a death sentence for any commoner... But you, shereen, do not strike me as a commoner. If I had told you directly, you would have become, shall we say, complicit. But since those illicit words did not escape my lips, you would merely be agreeing to help an unfortunate soul — me — to recapture a few containers. My sincerest wish was to protect you from any unnecessary trouble, shereen. I swear by the Exalted One! And I do hope that this, ah, misunderstanding will not affect our future cooperation...?"

traits.locale_text: «Escúcheme, {name}. De verdad que lo siento mucho. En mis negocios, cuanto menos sepan los demás, menos preguntas me hacen. No tendría que haberle ocultado la verdad de nuestro acuerdo. Sí, en mi cargamento hay xenoartefactos, lo que supondría la condena a muerte para cualquier persona de a pie... aunque a usted, shereen, {mf|señor|señora} de mundos y portado{mf|r|ra} de la Patente sagrada, esas normas no le afectan. De modo que... este malentendido no tiene por qué condicionar nuestros tratos futuros, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: 「そうだね…うん、あたしの船には異種族のアーティファクトが積んである。所持した一般市民は死刑になる代物さ…だけどシャリーン、アタシを一般市民扱いしないでよ。正直に話していたら、アンタはほら、あたしの共犯者になっていたんだ。だからそんな違法な言葉があたしの口から滑り出さなかったから、アンタは不幸な魂…つまりあたしに協力して、コンテナを何個か取り戻すことに頷いたんだよ。あたしは心から、アンタをいらないトラブルから守りたかった。エグザルテッド・ワンに誓ってね！それでその、今回の誤解が今後の協力関係に響かないといいんだけど…？」
languages.original_text: "And... yes, my shipment contains xeno-artefacts, possession of which is a death sentence for any commoner... But you, shereen, do not strike me as a commoner. If I had told you directly, you would have become, shall we say, complicit. But since those illicit words did not escape my lips, you would merely be agreeing to help an unfortunate soul — me — to recapture a few containers. My sincerest wish was to protect you from any unnecessary trouble, shereen. I swear by the Exalted One! And I do hope that this, ah, misunderstanding will not affect our future cooperation...?"

traits.locale_text: 「そうだね…うん、あたしの船には異種族のアーティファクトが積んである。所持した一般市民は死刑になる代物さ…だけどシャリーン、アタシを一般市民扱いしないでよ。正直に話していたら、アンタはほら、あたしの共犯者になっていたんだ。だからそんな違法な言葉があたしの口から滑り出さなかったから、アンタは不幸な魂…つまりあたしに協力して、コンテナを何個か取り戻すことに頷いたんだよ。あたしは心から、アンタをいらないトラブルから守りたかった。エグザルテッド・ワンに誓ってね！それでその、今回の誤解が今後の協力関係に響かないといいんだけど…？」

languages.text: "Und ja, meine Lieferung enthält Xeno-Artefakte, deren Besitz für alle Normalbürger die Todesstrafe bedeutet ... Ihr aber, Shereen, scheint mir {mf|kein Normalbürger|keine Normalbürgerin} zu sein. Hätte ich es Euch gleich gesagt, wärt Ihr {mf|mein|meine}, sagen wir, {mf|Komplize|Komplizin} geworden. Aber nachdem diese verbotenen Worte nicht über meine Lippen kamen, habt Ihr lediglich zugestimmt, einer armen Seele – mir – bei der Wiederbeschaffung einiger Container zu helfen. Es war mein aufrichtiger Wunsch, Euch vor unnötigem Ärger zu bewahren, Shereen. Das schwöre ich beim Erhabenen! Und ich hoffe, dass sich dieses, ähm, Missverständnis nicht auf unsere weitere Zusammenarbeit auswirkt ...?"
languages.original_text: "And... yes, my shipment contains xeno-artefacts, possession of which is a death sentence for any commoner... But you, shereen, do not strike me as a commoner. If I had told you directly, you would have become, shall we say, complicit. But since those illicit words did not escape my lips, you would merely be agreeing to help an unfortunate soul — me — to recapture a few containers. My sincerest wish was to protect you from any unnecessary trouble, shereen. I swear by the Exalted One! And I do hope that this, ah, misunderstanding will not affect our future cooperation...?"

traits.locale_text: "Hört mir zu, {name}. Mir tut die Sache wirklich leid. In meiner Branche gilt, je weniger andere wissen, desto weniger Fragen stellen sie. Ich hätte die Wahrheit über unser Abkommen nicht vor Euch verbergen sollen. Ja, meine Lieferung enthält Xeno-Artefakte, deren Besitz für alle Normalbürger die Todesstrafe bedeutet ... Aber Ihr, Shereen, {mf|Herr|Herrin} über Welten und {mf|Träger|Trägerin} des heiligen Handelsbriefs, seid solchen Regeln nicht unterworfen. Daher sollten wir dieses, äh, Missverständnis nicht unsere künftige Zusammenarbeit beeinträchtigen lassen, oder?"

languages.text: « Et... oui, mon chargement contient des xéno-artefacts, dont la détention est passible de mort pour les personnes ordinaires... Mais vous êtes tout sauf une personne ordinaire, shereen. Si je vous l'avais dit directement, vous seriez {mf|devenu|devenue}... complice, si l'on peut dire. Mais puisque ces révélations illicites n'ont pas franchi mes lèvres, vous accepteriez simplement d'aider une malheureuse en détresse – moi, en l'occurrence – à récupérer quelques conteneurs. Tout ce que je voulais, c'était vous protéger, shereen. Je le jure sur l'Exalté et j'espère sincèrement que ce... euh... malentendu n'affectera pas notre coopération future... »
languages.original_text: "And... yes, my shipment contains xeno-artefacts, possession of which is a death sentence for any commoner... But you, shereen, do not strike me as a commoner. If I had told you directly, you would have become, shall we say, complicit. But since those illicit words did not escape my lips, you would merely be agreeing to help an unfortunate soul — me — to recapture a few containers. My sincerest wish was to protect you from any unnecessary trouble, shereen. I swear by the Exalted One! And I do hope that this, ah, misunderstanding will not affect our future cooperation...?"

traits.locale_text: « Écoutez, {name}. Je suis vraiment désolée pour tout ça. Dans mon milieu, moins les gens en savent, moins ils posent de questions. Je n'aurais pas dû vous cacher la vérité sur notre accord. Oui, mon chargement contient des xéno-artefacts, dont la détention est passible de mort pour les personnes ordinaires... Mais vous qui êtes {mf|maître|maîtresse} des mondes et {mf|porteur|porteuse} de la lettre de marque sacrée, vous n'avez pas à vous inquiéter de ce genre de lois. Alors je propose que nous ne laissions pas ce... malentendu affecter notre coopération future, qu'en dites-vous ? »

languages.text: "Ayrıca... Evet, sevkiyatım avam için darağacı anlamına gelen zeno eserleri içeriyor. Sense pek sıradan durmuyorsun şirinim. Doğrudan söyleseydim suç ortağım olurdun. Ancak bu yasa dışı sözler dudaklarımdan dökülmediğinden sadece benim gibi talihsiz bir insancığa birkaç konteyneri geri almasında yardım etmeyi kabul etmiş oldun. En içten dileğim, seni gereksiz belalardan korumaktı şirinim. Görkemli'ye yemin olsun! Umarım bu... Yanlış anlaşılma, gelecekteki iş birliğimizi etkilemez..."
languages.original_text: "And... yes, my shipment contains xeno-artefacts, possession of which is a death sentence for any commoner... But you, shereen, do not strike me as a commoner. If I had told you directly, you would have become, shall we say, complicit. But since those illicit words did not escape my lips, you would merely be agreeing to help an unfortunate soul — me — to recapture a few containers. My sincerest wish was to protect you from any unnecessary trouble, shereen. I swear by the Exalted One! And I do hope that this, ah, misunderstanding will not affect our future cooperation...?"

traits.locale_text: "Ayrıca... Evet, sevkiyatım avam halk için darağacı anlamına gelen zeno eserleri içeriyor ama sen pek öyle avam durmuyorsun şirinim. Doğrudan söyleseydim suç ortağı olurdun ama bu yasa dışı sözler dudaklarımdan dökülmediğinden, sadece benim gibi talihsiz bir kişiye birkaç konteyneri geri alması için yardım etmeyi kabul edecektin. En içten dileğim seni gereksiz belalardan korumaktı şirinim. Görkemli'ye yemin ederim! Umarım bu, ıııı... Yanlış anlaşılma, gelecekteki iş birliğimizi etkilemez..."
